mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select clazz.*, emp.name masterName from clazz left join emp on clazz.master_id = emp.id
clazz.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and clazz.end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by clazz.update_time desc
